item.title: 12.1. auto-delete
item.description: ç©ºã«ãªã£ãŸãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«å‰Šé™¤ ä¸‹è¨˜ã®è¨­å®šã‚’ã—ã¦ãŠãã¨ã€C-x h ã§å…¨é¸æŠã—ã¦ delete ã—ãŸã‚ã¨ kill-buffer ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚ (defun my:delete-file-if-no-contents () "Automatic deletion for empty files (Valid in all modes)." (when (and (buffer-file-name (current-buffer)) (= (point-min) (point-max))) (delete-file (buffer-file-name (current-buffer))))) (if (not (memq 'my:delete-file-if-no-contents after-save-hook)) (setq after-save-hook (cons 'my:delete-file-if-no-contents after-save-hook))) é–‹ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒãƒƒãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã¦å½“è©²ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹ ã‚„ã‚„å±é™ºãªã®ã§ã‚ã¾ã‚ŠãŠã™ã™ã‚ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒâ€¦ å®‰å…¨ã‚’æœŸã™ãŸã‚ã«ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã¯ã—ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚ (defun my:delete-this-file () "Delete the current file, and kill the buffer." (interactive) (unless (buffer-file-name) (error "No file is currently being edited")) (when (yes-or-no-p (format "Really delete '%s'?" (file-name-nondirectory buffer-file-name))) (delete-file (buffer-file-name)) (kill-this-buffer)))

item.title: 12.4. open terminal
item.description: gnome-terminal ã‚’ Emacsã‹ã‚‰å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™ Emacsã§é–‹ã„ã¦ã„ã‚‹buffer ã®current-dir ã§ gnome-terminal ã‚’èµ·å‹•ã•ã›ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã¯eshell ã‚’ä½¿ã†æ©Ÿä¼šãŒæ¸›ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ (defun term-current-dir-open () "Open terminal application in current dir." (interactive) (let ((dir (directory-file-name default-directory))) (compile (concat "gnome-terminal --working-directory " dir)))) (bind-key "<f4>" 'term-current-dir-open)
